member.name: IExplorerCommandState.GetState
member.summary: Gets the command state associated with a specified Shell item.
member.param: A pointer to an with a single element that represents the Shell item.

FALSE if a verb object should not perform any memory intensive computations that could cause the UI thread to stop responding. The verb object should return E_PENDING in that case. If TRUE, those computations can be completed.
A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one or more Windows Explorer command states indicated by the constants.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
